title: Fix unreachable manifest undefined branch in AppView
description: Verify and fix unreachable manifest equality branch in apps/shell/src/pages/AppView.tsx by correctly distinguishing loading vs not-found states for app manifests.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Verified and fixed unreachable branch in AppView. AppView now distinguishes manifest loading versus app not found using registry loaded state and manifest lookup. Removed the unreachable manifest equality guard. Validation completed with pnpm filter shell typecheck and pnpm filter shell build; both passed.
